summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5483 for the improvement of 59th Avenue Southwest, from West Hanford Street to Orleans Street; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 69939, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
